channel.title: Pre -processing-data on Ángela Castillo-Gill
channel.description: Recent content in Pre -processing-data on Ángela Castillo-Gill

item.title: Pre-processing to what extent?
item.description: The goal of today’s session was to learn how to preprocess the homes dataset I’ve been working with. The missing values have been filled and now I have a few questions about whether I should perform or not, additional pre-processing steps before I can implement the CART algorithm. Should I remove highly correlated variables? I have three and I don’t know what to do with them? Should I remove levels within factor variables with few observations?
